actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: To authorize and direct the Secretary of the Interior to quitclaim to Kaiser Steel Corporation the remaining interest of the United States in and to certain public lands in Riverside County, California.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Interior to quitclaim to Kaiser Steel Corporation the remaining interest of the United States in and to certain public lands in Riverside County, California.

titles.title: To authorize and direct the Secretary of the Interior to quitclaim to Kaiser Steel Corporation the remaining interest of the United States in and to certain public lands in Riverside County, California.
